A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: LOVED it. Can't stop thinking about it. By far the most spiritual Star Wars film in its approach to the Force and what this means in relation to surrendering\, accepting and non-resistance. I totally understand why people would have a problem with some of the decisions made but I feel like every single choice served the characters faithfully and took Star Wars into new and uncharted territory. I believe it will only get better after subsequent viewings.
